title: A Day with a Zürich Developer | DevCities (Work-life, Startups, and Life in Nature)

media:group.media:title: A Day with a Zürich Developer | DevCities (Work-life, Startups, and Life in Nature)
media:group.media:description:
Grüezi, dear developers! Have you ever wondered what it’s like to live in Zürich? In this episode of DevCities, we meet Marius Colaciou, Engineer Lead at Ledgy and nature-connoisseur, to learn about life in the Swiss city. We asked Marius to share some of his favourite local spots and tell us about the culture and work life.
Join us to learn more about why Marius chose startups over corporates like Google, what he thinks about the dev community and quality of life in Switzerland… and why he calls the city a ‘sweaty buffet’.
**Special thanks to Jahlela Hasle, Timo Horstschäfers and Jules Henze.

Check out the home for untold developer stories around open source, careers and all the other cool stuff developers are doing at cult.honeypot.io.
